elements.name: panel1
elements.title: What are the primary instruments of marketing communication? Briefly describe each instrument using the characteristics of appearance, form and example.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: How can communication channels be described?
choices: Connection path of the information flow between recipient and recipient
Spreading the marketing message to customers
Connection path of the information flow between sender and receiver
correctAnswer: Spreading the marketing message to customers
Connection path of the information flow between sender and receiver

elements.name: question2
elements.title: How are communication channels differentiated? Give an example of each.
elements.correctAnswer: Type (synchronous, asynchronous, discrete, continuous), direction (one-way or two-way), role distribution (fixed or variable), interactivity, online, offline, involved conversation partners (scalability)
